Looks like its Compare or JDT.  James, pls have a peek.

Moving to compare. Andre, we do not add any tool items to the content merge
viewer. I looked at the SWT code and I'm really not certain under what
circumstances this will even fail; it looks quite strange. This might be beneath
compare.

Don't know why I can't add a ToolItem to a toolbar.
